remarks: The zero functional in the set of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcd0v2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd0v2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0v2.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcd0v2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lcd0v2.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0v2.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcd0v2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0v2 $p |- ( ph -> O = .0. ) $.
